page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: There are three schools: an Infant school, a Junior school and Bohunt Community Centre and School. Bohunt also has a playgroup for young children below five years old, after going to one of the playgroups children move onto Liphook Infant school. This has three years and about 300 pupils.After going there the pupils move to the Junior school which has bout 350 pupils.When the pupils are 11 years old they move to Bohunt. This is a community school which means it has sport, drama and other such activities. It has 5 years and just over 1100 pupils. Alternatively at the age of 11 you can take an examination to gain entrance to Churchers just outside Petersfield.
